unnormalised: New Delhi – The nationwide smart meter deployment is progressing steadily, with several states ramping up installations under the Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (RDSS). Power distribution companies (DISCOMs) like Tata Power Delhi Distribution Limited (TPDDL) are leading the charge, aiming for complete smart meter coverage by 2025.

unnormalised: The initiative seeks to reduce Aggregate Technical and Commercial (AT&C) losses and improve billing efficiency.
